description: Try our easy to follow Crayfish & Crisp Lettuce Panini With Herbed Mayonnaise recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Crayfish & Crisp Lettuce Panini With Herbed Mayonnaise Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 anchovy fillet in olive oil, drained and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Remove all the meat from the crayfish tails, being careful not to break it up too much. Tear into four even portions, and set aside.
To make the herbed mayonnaise, combine the mayonnaise, lime juice, herbs, and anchovy in a bowl. Season with black pepper, and stir through.

Slice the rolls in half, but without cutting all the way through. Open up, and spread with the herbed mayonnaise. Arrange some of the leaves over the mayonnaise, then put the crayfish on top of the leaves. Arrange slices of the peaches between the crayfish, then spoon over a little more of the mayonnaise. Close up the rolls, and serve immediately.
